name: Zombie Island (itch) (brianbaldner)
description:
***NEW UPDATE***

NETWORK FEATURES

Download the latest update to create an account and climb the leaderboard. This update also ships with a settings page and a pause menu.

Very early development

In Zombie Island, you try to survive hoards of zombies on a remote island. You get weapon drops to keep yourself alive. How long can you last?

You only start with a pistol and limited ammo. Zombies can drop ammo when you kill them. Near noon you have a chance of getting a supply drop, except for after the first night, when you are guaranteed to. Supply drops drop primary weapons, like ARs, snipers, and SMGs. Waves of zombies go up every night you survive. See how long you can last!
